scripts.prepare:mumbai: mustache config/mumbai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:matic: mustache config/matic.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:amoy: mustache config/amoy.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy:mumbai: npm run prepare:mumbai && npx graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ decentraland/tpr-matic-mumbai
scripts.deploy:matic: npm run prepare:matic && npx graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ decentraland/tpr-matic-mainnet
scripts.deploy:amoy: npm run prepare:amoy && npx graph deploy --studio decentraland/tpr-matic-amoy
